channel.title: CVE Feed for Western Digital -- My Cloud Home web app
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Western Digital -- My Cloud Home web app

item.title: CVE-2024-22168|2024-06-25T14:51:55.016Z -- western%20digital -- my%20cloud%20home%20web%20app
item.description: A Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability on the My Cloud, My Cloud Home, SanDisk ibi, and WD Cloud web apps was found which could allow an attacker to redirect the user to a crafted domain and reset their credentials, or to execute arbitrary client-side code in the user’s browser session to carry out malicious activities.The web apps for these devices have been automatically updated to resolve this vulnerability and improve the security of your devices and data.

item.title: CVE-2024-22168|2024-06-24T22:54:16.903Z -- western%20digital -- my%20cloud%20home%20web%20app
item.description: A Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability on the My Cloud, My Cloud Home, SanDisk ibi, and WD Cloud web apps was found which could allow an attacker to redirect the user to a crafted domain and reset their credentials, or to execute arbitrary client-side code in the user’s browser session to carry out malicious activities.The web apps for these devices have been automatically updated to resolve this vulnerability and improve the security of your devices and data.
